name: Lucky Burger
description:
Made by:
Espen Haftorn Gonzalez
Kaja Arielle Sommerstad Bergseth

Controls:
Press and hold space bar to grab an ingredient, let go to drop it.
Press space bar on bell to finish the burger. 

Description:
Wanna make a burger?

Made during Valmuen Game Jam March 2019, where the theme was "One Button"
